title: Alpha Client does not support Windows Vista
body:
I got a message a week ago about being accepted as an alpha tester, only to find out that the new client does not support 
**_WINDOWS VISTA!!_** Can anyone help me in appealing to riot about making the client compatible with Vista, because I know there is a considerable amount of League players who use vista and would like to continue to play league after the New Client becomes mandatory.

replies.body:
Windows Vista


I think I found your problem.
Hey, not all of us can afford fancy computers.

I'd rather go back to 98SE than have to run Vista.
My PC is second hand, came with retail copy of Windows 7, took the free upgrade to 10.
I got one of them Inspiron 530s.
I don't know where you got that information, but it is inaccurate. We support Windows XP SP3 and any version newer than that.
Well I assumed because my friend and I, who we both have windows vista, arent able to run the program. It just shows a blank screen.
Can confirm, new alpha client will not run on Vista as administrator or not.
I already tried that option. Seems to me as a compatibility issue.
It seems that this is a Windows Vista issue. Windows vista users consistently report that the Alpha Client doesn't work with this operating system.
